name: Cobson saves the Sharty 1
description:
*note4nonsoiteens:

this game is 'edgy' as it pertains to the soyjak party site, everything in this game is satire. this game is NOT meant to promote violence in anyway! if you don't 'get-it' and found this page randomly then this game is not for you. also, i will be shifting direction into making this a browser game.

-=- 'work in progress' (sucks) -=-  05/09/2022

i felt like uploading it now im lazy and have no stimulants. i feel (as of now) like im not going to finish it but """"gameplay"""" wise its done

the plot is cobson has to defend the sharty from CP spammers and defeat kuz

- open source? -

i have everything in the 7zip for you to edit and change the game yourself as long as you have godot so feel free to do that.

i put a ? mark because i don't know if that counts as open source 'exactly'

----------------

controls:

WASD

click / space to attack

shift for power

----------------
